com.betfair.cougar.modules.zipkin.impl

Class ZipkinEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betfair.cougar.modules.zipkin.impl.ZipkinEmitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    @ManagedResource
public class ZipkinEmitter
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    An emitter capable of emitting ZipkinData information to a ZipkinSpanCollector. ZipkinEmitter should be instantiated per service, as it stores information about the service (attaching it to the emitted spans transparently).
    See Also:
    ZipkinData

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZipkinEmitter

        public ZipkinEmitter(@Nonnull
             String serviceName,
             @Nonnull
             com.github.kristofa.brave.zipkin.ZipkinSpanCollector zipkinSpanCollector,
             @Nonnull
             Clock clock)
        Creates a new ZipkinEmitter. This constructor overload obtains the service IPv4 through com.betfair.cougar.util.geolocation.RemoteAddressUtils.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The name of the service the emitter will correspond to
        zipkinSpanCollector - The brave ZipkinSpanCollector to be used for emitting spans
        clock - The clock to be used when obtaining timestamps

      • ZipkinEmitter

        public ZipkinEmitter(@Nonnull
             String serviceName,
             @Nonnull
             com.github.kristofa.brave.zipkin.ZipkinSpanCollector zipkinSpanCollector,
             @Nonnull
             Clock clock,
             int serviceIPv4)
        Creates a new ZipkinEmitter.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The name of the service the emitter will correspond to
        zipkinSpanCollector - The brave ZipkinSpanCollector to be used for emitting spans
        clock - The clock to be used when obtaining timestamps
        serviceIPv4 - The IPv4 of the service the emitter will correspond to

      • buildAnnotationsStore

        @Nonnull
public ZipkinAnnotationsStore buildAnnotationsStore(@Nonnull
                                                   ZipkinData zipkinData)
        Builds an annotations store for a specific ZipkinData object.

        The returning object should be used to emit more than 1 annotation at once. After adding your annotations you will need to call emitAnnotations in order to send the span with all the annotations to Zipkin.

        Parameters:
        zipkinData - Zipkin request data
        Returns:
        Zipkin annotations storage capable of merging multiple annotations per emission

      • emitAnnotations

        public void emitAnnotations(@Nonnull
                   ZipkinAnnotationsStore zipkinAnnotationsStore)
        Emits a pre-populated storage of annotations to Zipkin.
        Parameters:
        zipkinAnnotationsStore - Zipkin annotations storage representing the entire list of annotations to emit

      • afterPropertiesSet

        public void afterPropertiesSet()
        Specified by:
        afterPropertiesSet in interface org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

      • getCurrentQueueSize

        @ManagedAttribute
public int getCurrentQueueSize()
        Gets the current size of the underlying queue (of spans). This method returns -1 if ZipkinEmitter was unable to obtain a reference to the queue.
        Returns:
        The current size of the underlying queue

      • getRemainingQueueCapacity

        @ManagedAttribute
public int getRemainingQueueCapacity()
        Gets the remaining capacity of the underlying queue (of spans). This method returns -1 if ZipkinEmitter was unable to obtain a reference to the queue.
        Returns:
        The remaining capacity of the underlying queue
